nodes.text: This Cor village was located on the planet Gargolyn IV. It has the ancestral home of a tribe of Cor, who in the distant past have been attacked by a monster. Their shaman eventually defeated the monster, binding it within the planet's surface. This remained active so long as the Cor tribe remained living within the village.

The Karflo Corporation forcibly removed the Cor trive from this village, in order to build a factory there. This casued the beast to emerge and destroy the construction site. It was only subdues when the Cor were returned to the village.
